title: r/Maliciouscompliance How A Stupid Karen Got Herself Fired!
description: r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, a high-ranking executive at a large company decides that she doesn't need mandatory training because she's just too important and has too many things to do! OP is happy to accommodate her, even though it was Karen's boss who specifically required Karen to take the training. I'm sure this won't come back to bite you in the butt, Karen!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
